EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for contacting Beam Suntory Customer Service. We are unable to accept Maker’s Mark Barrel purchase orders until the barrel is ready to bottle. You will be contacted by your state manager and asked to issue a purchase order once the proof and case quantity have been confirmed. Thank you, Beam Suntory Customer Service
